FuncDef: The display memory threshold command is used to query the memory usage threshold for generating an alarm and the memory usage threshold for clearing the alarm. The display memory threshold command is used to query the memory usage threshold for generating an alarm and the memory usage threshold for clearing the alarm.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
